DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria General Inclusion Criteria： 1 . Age:1875Y 2 . Patients stable angina acute coronary syndrome consider suitable coronary revascularization . 3 . Patient legal guardian understands agree comply specify study requirement provide write informed consent . Angiographic Inclusion Criteria： 1 . Significant coronary de novo lesion ( > 70 % visual estimation ) . 2 . Target lesion de novo native coronary artery lesion treat 12 stent . 3 . Reference vessel diameter 2.5 4.0 mm . Exclusion Criteria： General Exclusion Criteria： 1 . STsegment elevation myocardial infarction within 7 day prior index procedure . 2 . Previous CABG . 3 . Life expectancy < 12 month due another medical condition . 4 . Contraindication antiplatelet therapy 5 . Creatinine level 2.0mg/dL ESRD . 6 . Severe hepatic dysfunction ( 3 time normal reference value ) . 7 . Planned surgery procedure ≤ 6 month postindex procedure . 8 . Known allergy stainless steel history hypersensitivity sirolimus structurally related compound . 9 . Female childbearing potential positive pregnancy test within 7 day index procedure , lactating , intend become pregnant 12 month post index procedure . 10 . Patient clinically appropriate OCT evaluation opinion investigator . Angiographic Exclusion Criteria： 1 . Study lesion ostial location ( within 3.0 mm vessel origin ) . 2 . Study lesion involve arterial segment highly tortuous anatomy . 3 . Complex lesion morphology ( aortoostial , bifurcation need two stent technique , leave main , severe thrombus , heavy calcification ) .
